moods.name: Happy
quotes: Joy is the simplest form of gratitude.
Happiness is a choice, not a result.

moods.name: Sad
quotes: It's okay to not be okay.

moods.name: Thoughtful
quotes: The unexamined life is not worth living.

moods.name: Angry
quotes: Anger is an acid that can do more harm to the vessel in which it is stored than to anything on which it is poured.

moods.name: Silly
quotes: Life is better when you're laughing.

moods.name: Heartbroken
quotes: The heart was made to be broken.
The saddest thing about love is that not only that it cannot last forever, but that heartbreak is soon forgotten.
